messages.text:
So our assignment project is  "Smart Parking System"

‚óè Description: Build a system to detect available parking slots and prevent double
bookings, ensuring a seamless user experience.
‚óè Focus Areas:
1. Usability: Provide clear parking slot availability and reservation status.
2. Reliability: Prevent errors like assigning a single slot to multiple vehicles.
3. Performance: Ensure the system remains fast and responsive during peak
usage.

text_entities.text:
So our assignment project is  "Smart Parking System"

‚óè Description: Build a system to detect available parking slots and prevent double
bookings, ensuring a seamless user experience.
‚óè Focus Areas:
1. Usability: Provide clear parking slot availability and reservation status.
2. Reliability: Prevent errors like assigning a single slot to multiple vehicles.
3. Performance: Ensure the system remains fast and responsive during peak
usage.

text:
-Allow users to create accounts using email.
-Support guest mode with limited functionality, such as viewing available slots without making a reservation.

-Display the number of available parking slots in real-time.
-Highlight the specific location of available slots (e.g., Slot A1, Slot B2).

-Allow users to reserve a parking slot through a web app.
-Include two option to book or free the parking slot.
-Ensure that each slot can only be reserved or assigned to one vehicle at a time.
-Notify users of slot reservation status, release or any changes via email.

(If time permits)
-Include user wallets to notify the users of their usage fees.

text_entities.text: User Login/Signup

-Allow users to create accounts using email.
-Support guest mode with limited functionality, such as viewing available slots without making a reservation.
2.Real-Time Parking Availability

-Display the number of available parking slots in real-time.
-Highlight the specific location of available slots (e.g., Slot A1, Slot B2).
3.Slot Reservation

-Allow users to reserve a parking slot through a web app.
-Include two option to book or free the parking slot.
4.Booking Conflict Prevention
-Ensure that each slot can only be reserved or assigned to one vehicle at a time.
5.User Notifications
-Notify users of slot reservation status, release or any changes via email.
6.Payment Integration

(If time permits)
-Include user wallets to notify the users of their usage fees.

messages.text:
Cost we have done as
1st floor - 10‚Çπ per hour
2nd floor - 8‚Çπ per hour
3rd - 6‚Çπ per hour

The cost incurred is sent in the response message when the user releases the booked lot.

We were thinking like this is like a parking lot of a mall in the basement 
So the floor -1 has the highest charges and it reduces as we go deeper
